turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Blanca, could you order a coffee for me at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Try to visit the once close by. I believe the address is 765 N Temperance Ave #101, Clovis, CA 93611.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'm familiar with that one. What specifically would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a normal coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about creamer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, a normal black coffee is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a black coffee then. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets do a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so just to make sure, you would like a grande plain black coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good to me!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. And do you want me to use the card on account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes use that and charge it to my card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect! you should receive a text soon! I just placed an order for your grande black coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks you're the best!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have a nice day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too.
